questions.question: According to the lyrics, what does the singer believe is preventing the other person from expressing their feelings?
The singer states, "A full commitment's what I'm thinking of." Which of the following promises from the chorus best exemplifies this idea of commitment?
options: A. Never gonna make you cry
C. Never gonna run around and desert you
questions.answer: C. Never gonna run around and desert you

questions.question: What is the implied nature of the "game" mentioned in the line, "We know the game and we're gonna play it"?
options: A. A contest to see who will confess their feelings first.
B. A playful rivalry between two friends.
C. The unspoken, mutual progression towards a romantic relationship.
D. A deceitful plan to trick the other person.
questions.answer: C. The unspoken, mutual progression towards a romantic relationship.

questions.question: The singer contrasts his reliability with that of others by stating:
options: A. "We've known each other for so long"
B. "You wouldn't get this from any other guy"
C. "Don't tell me you're too blind to see"
D. "You know the rules and so do I"
questions.answer: B. "You wouldn't get this from any other guy"
